snippet: One of the newest additions to the world of apps for beer lovers is Intoxicase, which will help log your brew consumption, but the app's developer has also released a protective case that beer drinkers will most likely find more intoxicating than the...
abstract: One of the newest additions to the world of apps for beer lovers is Intoxicase, which will help log your brew consumption, but the app's developer has also released a protective case that beer drinkers will most likely find more intoxicating than the app.
